body: The original Tomoko is actually genius level. By forcing the guy into her body with a "curse" that requires constant sexual contact with Kiyoshi, a guy that he pushed around, she was guaranteeing that the guy would be too distracted to react to the body swap at first. Then once he got accustomed to the body, the frequent sexual contact and reliance on Kiyoshi would lead to love which takes "Tomoko" completely out of the equation in the long run. It's seriously diabolical
The art is gud but the story is a bit weird
